column1: I'm a UK citizen that is flying into Dubrovnik. I also wished to visit Kotor and Zabljak in Montenegro and then return back to Croatia to fly out again from Dubrovnik. Is this possible with the new measures? Does Montenegro count as a third national country? Will we need to do a PCR test? We also had hoped to visit Sarajevo and Mostar but this seems unlikely to happen due to border restrictions.
